title: RT News - October 27, 2019 (17:00 MSK)
text: Russian national and gun rights activist Maria Butina arrives back in Moscow, after serving most of an 18-month prison sentence in the US for unregistered lobbying activities. She shared her story first with RT. The US says it's sending 'mechanized forces' to secure the oil fields of eastern Syria - overturning Donald Trump's earlier announcement of a troop withdrawal from the region. Civil strife sweeps across Chile - as demonstrators call for a broad set of social reforms to tackle rampant inequality and high living costs.
description: Russian national and gun rights activist Maria Butina arrives back in Moscow, after serving most of an 18-month prison sentence in the US for unregistered lobbying activities
